1.name: Attack
1.description: Agents with the Attack specialty possess formidable damage output capabilities, excelling at rapidly racking up damage directly through attacks to defeat enemies and bring the combat to a swift end.

2.name: Stun
2.description: Agents with the Stun specialty possess powerful control abilities, excelling at building up Daze to cause enemies to be Stunned, thus creating opportunities for the squad to deal damage.

3.name: Anomaly
3.description: Agents with the Anomaly specialty are exceptional with applying debuffs, excelling at accumulating Anomaly Buildup to weaken enemies and deal damage by triggering Attribute Anomalies.

4.name: Support
4.description: Agents with the Support specialty are able to aid and enhance other Agents in battle, excelling at buffing friendly units to improve the combat effectiveness of the whole squad.

5.name: Defense
5.description: Agents with the Defense specialty have strong survivability, excelling at tanking attacks to counterattack, seizing the upper hand for their side in the heat of battle.
